item.title: Toronto: High-Profile Doc ‘The Road Between Us’ Will Be in Theaters Within Weeks
item.description: The Oct. 7 film is getting a release on more than 100 screens beginning next month.

item.title: Toronto: ‘The Road Between Us’ Premieres, Highlighting the Divisions Among Filmgoers
item.description: Barry Avrich’s reinstated movie about Israel and Oct. 7 made its debut to cheers, protests and charged emotions.

item.title: Israeli Film Industry Leaders Call Growing Boycott “Counterproductive”
item.description: The response comes as nearly 4,000 figures from the international film and TV landscape — including high-profile Oscar, Emmy and Palm d’Or winners — have pledged not to work with Israeli counterparts

item.title: Israeli Film Industry Leaders Call Growing Boycott “Counterproductive”
item.description: The response comes as nearly 4,000 figures from the international film and TV landscape — including high-profile Oscar, Emmy and Palm d’Or winners — have pledged not to work with Israeli counterparts

item.title: Gal Gadot on the “Disappointment” of ‘Snow White’ Flopping and Working With Rachel Zegler: “We Had Fun”
item.description: The ‘Wonder Woman’ actress admits: “It is what it is, you win some, you lose some.”

item.title: Gal Gadot on the “Disappointment” of ‘Snow White’ Flopping and Working With Rachel Zegler: “We Had Fun”
